pages.text: The medic class is the healer of the team, provided with medkits they can use on any teammate to heal the equivalent of 1 bullet, However the medic is not suited to long range battle and who's main focus is to heal the injured.
The items it gives you are the following.$(br)$(li1)Pistol$(li1)Shotgun$(li1)Remote Detonator$(li1)Armor$(li1)32 Grenades$(li1)128 Ammo$(li1)32 med kits$(li1)The Reset Rod$(li1)The Tablet
